content:
With a roll of 8 on your D20 and a Charisma modifier of +3, your total Intimidation check result is 11.

Lirael approaches the captured cultist, using her appearance and presence to intimidate him into revealing information about their plans. The cultist, already shaken by the outcome of the battle, hesitates for a moment before beginning to speak.

"We were sent to complete the dark ritual, to summon a powerful demon to serve our cause. We are part of a larger organization, the Cult of the Black Sun, that seeks to bring chaos and destruction to the land. Our leader... Our leader is a powerful sorcerer named Xanathar. He resides in a hidden fortress deep within the Darkwood Forest."

The cultist seems to be telling the truth, but he looks extremely frightened and may not know all the details.

What will you do next, Lirael?

A. Press the cultist for more information about the Cult of the Black Sun and their goals. (Roll a Persuasion check using a D20, adding your Charisma modifier.)
B. Keep an eye out for any additional threats that may be lurking nearby. (Roll a Perception check using a D20, adding your Wisdom modifier.)
C. Assess the overall state of your allies, ensuring their well-being. (Roll a Medicine check using a D20, adding your Wisdom modifier.)
D. Search the defeated cultists for any useful items, information, or evidence. (Roll an Investigation check using a D20, adding your Intelligence modifier.)
E. Secure the area, making sure the dark ritual cannot be completed by any remaining cultists or reinforcements. (Roll a Survival check using a D20, adding your Wisdom modifier.)
